text: w'idha bddalna ayatan biayat akhra, wallah alkhaliq 'aelam bmslht khalqh bima ynzlh min al'ahkam fi al'awqat almkhtlft, qal alkfar: 'iinama 'ant -ya mhmd- kadhib mkhtaliq ealaa allah ma lam yaqulh. wamuhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam lays kama yzemwn. bal 'aktharuhum la eilm lahum birabihim wala bshreh wahkamh
